message.content:
While we'll talk about our revenue model at some point, before then I did want to jump in to say:

Everyone is bringing up great points. There are lots of advantages and disadvantages of each model. **But there is no best.** Only tradeoffs. Or best for certain people. So if you find yourself saying that in general "this model is better than that one" you're probably missing a perspective or two.

My 2 cents anyway.
